questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
check and confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing report
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230

videos.src: assets/videos/SEMAAMEURA_PHOENIX/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET

questions.question: shift the equipment to another place where the AC Voltage of 230 is provided
check the power cord continuity as shown in the video and confirm whether the power cord is defective

videos.src: assets/videos/SEMAAMEURA_PHOENIX/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CABLE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CABLE

questions.question: replace the power cord with the new one
ON the mains ON/OFF Switch, check the continuity of switch and confirm whether the switch is defective.
replace the switch with a new one
check and confirm whether the Input voltage of 230VAC is available.
check and confirm is there any loose connection / breakage of cable from ON/OFF switch.
reconnect / replace the cable accordingly
check and confirm whether the output of power supply is available
repair / replace the power supply accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the power supply

questions.question: replace / repair the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the LED Bulb is getting ON.
open the equipment, check the voltage / continuity of each bulb and confirm whether the bulb is defective
repair / replace the bulb with a new one
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the technical team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
